summary:
French native skilled in Account Management, Marketing & Communication, Event Management and Project Management. During the past 8 years, I worked closely with industries from: Tech, ICT, R&D, Healthcare.

Digitally savvy, customer-centric, pragmatic, always looking to learn something new... But also traveler, photographer, geek...
